input_email_body:
Subject: Incident Involving Potential Data Breach of Medical Records

A data breach incident has been reported, potentially compromising medical records within the hospital's system. We have tried to improve security measures and update the affected applications, but we need your assistance to ensure data protection.. My contact number is +86-10-8500-1234.
